data.text: Ndidzayamika Yehova nthawi zonse;
Moyo wanga udzanyadira Yehova;
Lemekezani Yehova pamodzi ndi ine;
Ine ndinafunafuna Yehova ndipo Iye anandiyankha;
Iwo amene amayang ºana kwa Iye, nkhope zawo zimanyezimira;
Munthu wosauka uno anayitana, ndipo Yehova anamumva;
Mngelo wa Yehova amatchinjiriza amene amakonda Iye
Lawani ndipo onani kuti Yehova ndi wabwino;
Wopani Yehova inu oyera mtima ake,
Mikango itha kulefuka ndi kumva njala
Bwerani ana anga, mundimvere;
Aliyense wa inu amene amakonda moyo wake
asunge lilime lake ku zoyipa
Tembenuka kuchoka ku zoyipa ndipo chita zabwino;
Maso a Yehova ali pa olungama
nkhope ya Yehova ikutsutsana ndi amene amachita zoyipa,
Olungama amafuwula, ndipo Yehova amawamva;
Yehova ali pafupi kwa osweka mtima
Munthu wolungama atha kukhala ndi mavuto ambiri,
Iye amateteza mafupa ake onse,
Choyipa chidzapha anthu oyipa;
Yehova amawombola atumiki ake;
